title: Bert Needs To Call His Therapist Because He Keeps Saying *THIS*
description:
We all know Bert is extremely straightforward, with us, with listeners, with his family, and even with himself.
A listener and possible therapist noticed something that Bert does that breaks her heart whenever she hears it.
